mapper.select: select r.resume_idx, r.resume_idx, r.res_name as title, r.username as user_id, r.name as user_name, r.user_email, r.tech_tags, a.num, a.job_position, a.applyday, a.progress, a.corp_idx, u.name as corp_name from apply a join resume r on a.resume_idx = r.resume_idx join user u on a.corp_idx = u.user_id where u.username = #{corp_idx} and a.progress = #{progress} order by a.applyday desc

update.foreach: update apply set progress = #{item.progress} where num = #{item.num} and corp_idx = #{item.corp_idx}

insert.foreach: insert into alarm (user_id, is_new, title, content, writeday, corp_idx, apply_num) values (#{item.user_id}, 0, #{item.title}, #{item.content}, now(), #{item.corp_idx}, #{item.apply_num})

mapper.select: select apply_num from favorite where corp_id = #{corp_id}
select corp_number from user where username = #{corp_name}
